statements: SELECT * FROM system_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_message, log_type FROM system_logs WHERE log_type = 'error';
SELECT log_id, log_message FROM system_logs WHERE log_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM system_logs WHERE log_type = 'info' AND log_message LIKE '%important%';
SELECT log_type, COUNT(*) AS log_count FROM system_logs GROUP BY log_type;
SELECT log_id, log_timestamp, log_message, log_type FROM system_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM system_logs WHERE log_type = 'error' ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC
SELECT log_message FROM system_logs WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT DISTINCT log_type FROM system_logs ORDER BY log_type
SELECT log_id, log_type, log_message FROM system_logs ORDER BY log_id LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM system_logs;
SELECT log_id, log_timestamp, log_message FROM system_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_timestamp, event_type FROM security_events WHERE event_timestamp > '2021-01-01';
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_description FROM security_events WHERE event_type = 'Login Attempt';
SELECT log_id, log_message FROM system_logs WHERE log_message ILIKE '%error%';
SELECT * FROM system_logs WHERE log_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_id, log_message FROM system_logs WHERE log_message LIKE '%error%' ORDER BY log_id;
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_description FROM security_events WHERE event_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY event_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM system_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT log_id, log_timestamp, log_message FROM system_logs WHERE log_message IS NOT NULL ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM system_logs;
SELECT log_message, log_timestamp FROM system_logs WHERE log_id = 1;
SELECT breach_description FROM security_breaches WHERE breach_id = 10;
SELECT vulnerability_name, vulnerability_severity FROM vulnerabilities WHERE vulnerability_id = 5;
SELECT vulnerability_name, vulnerability_severity FROM vulnerabilities ORDER BY vulnerability_severity DESC;
SELECT * FROM system_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT log_id, log_message FROM system_logs WHERE log_id > 1000 ORDER BY log_id ASC
SELECT * FROM vulnerabilities WHERE vulnerability_severity > 5 ORDER BY vulnerability_id
SELECT breach_id, breach_description FROM security_breaches WHERE breach_datetime BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31'
SELECT vulnerability_name, vulnerability_severity FROM vulnerabilities ORDER BY vulnerability_severity DESC, vulnerability_name
SELECT * FROM system_logs;
SELECT log_message, log_level FROM system_logs WHERE log_level = 'error';
SELECT event_description, event_type, event_timestamp FROM security_events ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT vulnerability_description, vulnerability_type FROM vulnerabilities WHERE vulnerability_type = 'SQL Injection';
SELECT report_description FROM breach_reports WHERE report_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT log_id, log_message, log_timestamp FROM system_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT event_description, event_type FROM security_events WHERE event_type = 'Brute Force Attack';
SELECT vulnerability_description, vulnerability_type FROM vulnerabilities WHERE vulnerability_type LIKE 'SQL%';
SELECT report_id, report_description, report_timestamp FROM breach_reports WHERE report_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT log_id, log_message, log_level, log_timestamp FROM system_logs JOIN security_events ON system_logs.log_timestamp = security_events.event_timestamp ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM system_logs;
SELECT log_timestamp, log_message FROM system_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_description FROM user_activity WHERE activity_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT event_type, event_details FROM security_events WHERE event_type = 'error';
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE username LIKE 'admin%';
SELECT * FROM system_logs WHERE log_timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT log_message, log_timestamp FROM system_logs WHERE log_id = 1 ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE activity_description LIKE '%login%' AND activity_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE username = 'admin' OR username = 'user' AND password LIKE '%password%'
SELECT event_type, COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM security_events GROUP BY event_type ORDER BY total_events DESC
